MeasurementToolMetadata.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview - Part A: Depression

mini_a1a.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A1a -  Ever depressed or down, nearly every day for two weeks?

mini_a1b.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A1b -  In the last two weeks depressed or down, nearly every day?

mini_a2a.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A2a -  Ever less interested in things for 2 weeks?

mini_a2b.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A2b -  Last two weeks less interested in things?

mini_a3a_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3a -  Current: Appetite decreased?

mini_a3a_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3a -  Past: Appetite decreased?

mini_a3b_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3b -  Current: Difficulty sleeping?

mini_a3b_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3b -  Past: Difficulty sleeping?

mini_a3c_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3c -  Current: Slow moving/fidgety?

mini_a3c_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3c -  Past: Slow moving/fidgety?

mini_a3d_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3d -  Current: Tired/without energy?

mini_a3d_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3d -  Past: Tired/without energy?

mini_a3e_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3e -  Current: Guilty or worthless feeling?

mini_a3e_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3e -  Past: Guilty or worthless feeling?

mini_a3e_delusion_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3e -  Current: Evidence of delusions of guilt?

mini_a3e_delusion_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3e -  Past: Evidence of delusions of guilt?

mini_a3f_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3f -  Current: Difficulty concentrating?

mini_a3f_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3f -  Past: Difficulty concentrating?

mini_a3g_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3g -  Current: Thoughts of death or suicide?

mini_a3g_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A3g -  Past: Thoughts of death or suicide?

mini_a4_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A4 -  Current: Symptoms cause distress or problems at home/work/socially or in some other important way?

mini_a4_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A4 -  Past: Symptoms cause distress or problems at home/work/socially or in some other important way?

mini_a5.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A5 -  Between 2 episodes of depression, 2 months symptom free?

mini_a6.LongName: M.I.N.I: Question A6 - DEPRESSION: Number of lifetime episodes
mini_a6.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: A6 -  How many depressive episodes over lifetime?

mini_a_diagnosis_depression.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: Fufils diagnostic criteria for major depressive episode?

mini_a_diagnosis_depression_current.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: Fufils diagnostic criteria for current major depressive episode?

mini_a_diagnosis_depression_past.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: Fufils diagnostic criteria for past major depressive episode?

mini_a_diagnosis_depression_recurrent.Description: Mini-International Neuropsychiatric Interview: Fufils diagnostic criteria for recurrent major depressive episode?
